CustomField.description: A Contact Enrollment is Active if their status is not Deactivated, Unenrolled or Complete.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Complete"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Deactivated"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Unenrolled"), ISPICKVAL( Assigned_Seat__c , "Deactivated"), Expired__c = True ),
False,
True)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A Contact Enrollment is Active if their status is not Deactivated, Unenrolled or Complete.
CustomField.label: Active
